title: Renovated apt, High ceilings, fireplace, French doors...take LOOK :)
posting_body: ['3rd floor of a 3 story building,', 'This apt is the entire floor, 1100 sq.ft+', 'REALLY NICE APT!!', 'This apt was a 3 bedroom.', 'However it was converted to a 2 bedroom apt to make it more spacious!!', 'It Has character & charm.', 'And it’s not a basement, illegal or a squished tight apartment.', '-Recently renovated', '-freshly painted', '-wood laminate floors', '-high ceilings', '-Gas fireplace for beautiful ambience', '-farmhouse country style pine trim throughout', '-Open kitchen/dining room area with half wall counters and Lots & lots of cabinets!', '-bedrooms 19’x10’, 13’x11’', '-2 wall Air Conditoners cool entire apt', '-ceiling fans in living room and bedrooms', '-you have Your OWN boiler & hot water heater with a thermostat in apt to control climate to your comfort level', '-Central location, Q55, (QM24, QM25,QM34)', 'Express buses to midtown or downtown on the corner (approx 40 mins), L & M train are a short car ride or 10-15 min walk', '-House is 50 feet off Myrtle Ave @ 71 St., quiet dead-end block.', '-Close by within 5 minutes: Myrtle Ave shops, banks & restaurants,Atlas Park Mall, Trader Joe’s, Home Depot, Forest Park (Golf, Mountain Biking¦), Jackie Robinson Parkway leading to Grand Central Parkway', 'SERIOUS INQUIRIES ONLY', 'By Owner', 'Application to include w-2, paystubs, credit check, references, etc.', 'Utilities are NOT included (need to pay for gas heat, electric & cable)', '$2250 available now!!', '(347)231-5114', 'August 1st', 'Available', 'No smoking']
